sources.title: DoubleFeatureHell10teenTerrors3
sources.description: Big trouble in Teen Town is exposed by this shocking 2am Theater double feature: The troubles begin with coming attractions followed by hot rods and medium chicks drag racing to traffic court in "Hot Rod Girl." Then the terrors of dating are exposed in the short subject, "What to do on a Date," followed by the second feature presentation, "Teenage Devil Dolls," in which one joint is enough to drive a teenage cutie to tight sweaters and a life of crime and degradation. (That first one must have been a dilly!)
